entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Hearst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:45 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C

Humidity: 89 %

Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: SSE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few flurries beginning early this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
